step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on the circular motion.
Nice movement! Try to bring your shoulder blades together as you roll them down.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Excellent control on this rep! Focus on a smooth, continuous motion.
You're doing well! Ensure your elbows stay relatively still as your shoulders move.
Fantastic finish! You've successfully completed both sets with good form.

exercise_summary: Great job with your shoulder rolls! You're improving shoulder mobility and supporting lymphatic flow. Remember to keep the motion smooth and controlled, and breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back.
